option.name: toggle
option._long: Toggles scale with the specified activator.

option.name: toggle_all
option._long: Toggles scale showing windows from all workspaces.

option.name: spacing
option._long: Sets the spacing between the views.

option.name: duration
option._long: Time it takes for views to transition. Units are in milliseconds.

option.name: interact
option._long: If this option is set, views will accept input in scale state. Otherwise, all events will be ignored except left click, which will activate the clicked view and terminate scale.

option.name: inactive_alpha
option._long: Set the opacity value of the inactive windows.

option.name: middle_click_close
option._long: Use the middle mouse button to close views in the scale state. Only applies if interactive mode is not enabled.
